author: Sharmishta Sarkar
title: Selected Amazon Prime Video kids' shows now available to stream for free
description: Amazon has unlocked a selection of its family-friendly shows for free streaming, without the need for a Prime membership.
content: Doing its part to keep the thousands who have self-isolated entertained, Amazon has opened up a selection of its family-friendly programming for free streaming. The Prime subscription paywall that is a usual requirement to watch Prime Video has been lifted fo… [+1171 chars]
